alert.note: Alert for Adair; Adams; Cass; Dallas; Guthrie; Madison; Taylor; Union (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 17 at 8:34PM CDT until March 18 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...Heavy Wet Snow Developing Overnight... .Low pressure in the Southern Plains will spread rain into Iowa tonight. The rain will change to snow across the advisory area in the predawn hours and continue through the day. Travel may become difficult at times with slick roads along with winds gusting to 35 mph which will reduce visibility Friday. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 4 PM CDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Southwest to Central Iowa. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 4 PM CDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...If a band of heavier snow expands farther north and east into Friday morning, additional counties may be added to the existing advisory.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Allow extra time to reach your destination safely. For the latest travel conditions before heading out, check the Iowa 511 app, www.511ia.org or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Adair; Adams; Cass; Dallas; Guthrie; Madison; Taylor; Union
